name: Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1)  v.151
description: It's ONLY for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! â–º The Goal: use at its maximum my WideScreen: - for the shots (Maximize the number of shots visible in the window) - for the Info (scroll list and hover) - for an admin happy life (adaptation for selected Greasemonkey scripts) - Less scrolling with a compact and useful styled interface. - Less "IN THE FACE" style (Smaller version of the shots in Photo Page and Justified Views). NEW (2020.04): To install all parts of "Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE" at once, you can use my userscript [Greasyfork]: Flickr WideScreen - BigONE - UserCSS (userstyle/script) Greasy Fork now supports User CSS as defined here for use with Stylus or as UserScript, read: [Beta] User CSS support

user.name: decembre
